@Phantom_generator_2D/phantom_generate.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 % ======================================================================
00002 %> @brief phantom_generate generates map with phantom described by eliptic
00003 %> elements
00004 %>
00005 %> @param mm      'square matrix' side size in [mm]
00006 %> @param         side size matrix in pixels
00007 %> @param el      vector with elipses (structure)
00008 %> @param defVal  permittivity in FOV
00009 %>
00010 %> @retval ph  map of permittivity distribution 
00011 % =====================================================================
00012 function ph = phantom_generate(phobj,mm,siz,el,defVal)
00013 
00014     % elements is vector of structures
00015     % midpoint  [x0,y0]
00016     % axes      [a,b]
00017     % theta     [th]
00018     % value     [v]
00019     
00020     % calculate pixelsize
00021     ps=mm/siz;
00022     phmid=mm/2; 
00023     % create fov image
00024     ph=ones(siz,siz)*defVal;
00025     % get number of phantom elements
00026     n=size(el);    
00027     for i=1:n,
00028             % recalculate element sizes from mm to pixels (0,0) point is in the
00029             % middle of phantom
00030             
00031             x0=(el(i,1)+phmid)/ps+0.5;
00032             y0=(el(i,2)+phmid)/ps+0.5;
00033             a=el(i,3)/ps;
00034             b=el(i,4)/ps;
00035             th=el(i,5);
00036             v=el(i,6);
00037             ph=phobj.ellipseMatrix(x0,y0,a,b,th,ph,-defVal);
00038             ph=phobj.ellipseMatrix(x0,y0,a,b,th,ph,v);
00039             
00040         end
00041     return;
